jobFunction: Accounting/Auditing, Human Resources, and Business Development
description:
Executive Recruitment Consultant
▶︎ Up to $130,000 salary (draw or base salary)
▶︎ 60% commission
▶︎ Average fees: $70,000+
▶︎ Hybrid working / 100% remote opportunity
▶︎ Walk into a client base across (re) insurance, asset management, hedge funds, investment banking etc.

Core market focuses:

• HR & Corporate Services
• Accounting & Finance
• Risk & Compliance
• Tax
• Legal
• Front Office (Private Credit & Public Credit)
• Middle Office & Operations

My client, a specialist financial services staffing firm has achieved tremendous growth over the last 2 years by quadrupling in headcount and not losing a single employee in that time. They are in the market for seasoned head-hunters across their core markets to plug into their existing client base with a constant flow of mandates to work. Consultants are billing minimum $500k here and top performers are bringing in $2 million+ annually.

They’re truly an autonomous and mature business who grant flexibility to their employees, it certainly isn’t a KPI & micro-management house.

If interested, please apply and we can schedule a time in to discuss
